headline: PODD Q2 Deep Dive: Omnipod 5 Adoption and International Expansion Drive Results
summary: Insulin delivery company Insulet Corporation (NASDAQ:PODD) reported Q2 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 32.9% year on year to $649.1 million. On top of that, next quarter’s revenue guidance ($671.7 million at the midpoint) was surprisingly good and 4.4% above what analysts were expecting. Its non-GAAP profit of $1.17 per share was 26.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
